subject: Golf
Cruelty to Animals
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Tripp Isenhour said that it was a “one-in-a-million” golf shot that killed a protected hawk and that he was only trying to scare the bird he now faces criminal charges for killing.
snippet: Tripp Isenhour said that it was a “one-in-a-million” golf shot that killed a protected hawk and that he was only trying to scare the bird he now faces criminal charges for killing.
